Add an innocent twist to your Tuesday happy hour with our Lite Sparkler Mocktail! 💚✨ Here’s the recipe 

▪️Pour Lime Lacroix into a champagne flute 
▪️Top it off with an ounce of pomegranate juice
▪️Drop in a few pomegranate seeds or limes for a fun garnish! https//t.co/gylq4IgYJ4
